title: Font similar to Didot ID
content:
So I saw this font in AIGA's 50 Books of 1962 book.  
The title of the book cover that includes the font is "41st Annual of Advertising & Editorial Art & Design"

It's very similar to Didot, but the 4's are very different. The closest 4 I've found is Bell MT.

Please help!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [IMG\_1422.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205050734/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_1422.JPG) | 110.67 KB |
| [IMG\_1421.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205050734/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_1421.JPG) | 125.04 KB |
author: gavinp

comments.content: Since it's from 1962 it may be an old headline Didot that was never digitized.

Hmm, makes sense.

Anyone else have any input?
